Hello Webpack

The button below activates a click handler in src/index.js file when it is clicked. Click for an alert message


-----------------------------------------------------

Click the text 'Click here' activate a click handler in src/index.js file to change the color of the element.

Click here
-----------------------------------------------------

Click anywhere in this example.

-----------------------------------------------------

This example demonstrate that in Arrow Functions, the "this" keyword represents the object that owns the function, no matter who calls the function.

Click the button to execute the "hello" function again, and you will see that "this" still represents the window object.
